mapper.select: select count(*) from user_login where account=#{account} and password=#{password} and category=#{category} ;
mapper.insert: insert into order_total (order_number,service_id, detect_company,detect_object,detect_project, detect_price,detect_time, detect_standard, user_name,create_time, update_time) values (#{orderNumber},#{serviceId},#{detectCompany}, #{detectObject},#{detectProject} , #{detectPrice},#{detectTime},#{detectStandard},#{userName}, #{createTime},#{updateTime} );
mapper.select: select service_id as serviceId,detect_company as detectCompany,detect_object as detectObject, detect_project as detectProject,detect_price as detectPrice,detect_time as detectTime, detect_standard as detectStandard,detect_score as detectScore FROM service WHERE detect_object = #{detectObject} and detect_project = #{detectProject} Order by detect_price asc , detect_score desc

select order_number as orderNumber,detect_company as detectCompany,detect_object as detectObject, detect_project as detectProject,detect_price as detectPrice,detect_time as detectTime, detect_standard as detectStandard,user_name as userName, create_time as createTime FROM order_total WHERE 1=1 and user_name = #{userName} Order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into rating_total ( order_number,service_id,detect_company,detect_object,detect_project, user_name,quality_score, speed_score,attitude_score,create_time, update_time,comment) values (#{orderNumber},#{serviceId},#{detectCompany}, #{detectObject},#{detectProject} , #{userName},#{qualityScore},#{speedScore},#{attitudeScore}, #{createTime},#{updateTime},#{comment} );
